structure.unit: STATE AND REGIONAL MENTAL HEALTH PROGRAMS

text.section: The commission created in KRS 210.575 shall meet at least quarterly or upon the call of the chair, the request of four (4) or more members, or the request of the Governor.
The commission shall review the plan annually and shall submit annual updates no later than October 1 to the Governor and the Legislative Research Commission.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 141, sec. 23, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2003 Ky. Acts ch. 108, sec. 2, effective June 24, 2003; and ch. 161, sec. 2, effective June 24, 2003. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 403, sec. 3, effective April 14, 2000.
